intents.answer: William is best aligned with UI/UX Designer, Product Designer, and Front-End focused digital production roles where design quality and implementation both matter.
His core strengths are UI/UX design, responsive web design, front-end collaboration, design systems, and digital + print production workflows.
He works across modern design and production tooling, including interface design, web production, and visual asset workflows for digital and print deliverables.
William is New York-based and open to discussing remote, hybrid, and on-site options depending on team needs and role scope.
He actively explores generative AI for concepting and creative acceleration, including prompt engineering and experimentation with tools like Imagen, Gemini, loraAi, and ComfyUI.
For interview timing and start-date details, the fastest path is direct outreach. William is responsive and can coordinate quickly via email.
Compensation is discussed based on role scope, level, location, and benefits. William can share expectations during recruiter screening.
Best contact: use the contact form in the footer.
